record.field: ${object.company_id.name} invites you to participate in a consent process

table.style: padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.p: The other guardian or your spouse in your family has joined the ${object.company_id.name} as a member. The membership is family-based, and parents of special needs children living in the same household can join as members. According to the association's rules, each person joining as a member must personally submit their information to the association's membership register.
When your spouse or the other guardian joins, the family-based membership fee has been paid, and there is no additional charge for your membership.

a.style: padding: 10px; background-color: #875A7B; color: #FFF; border-radius: 5px; text-decoration: none;

td.p: If you have any questions about your membership or the activities of ${object.company_id.name}, please contact ${object.company_id.email}.
